org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.util

Interface CrystalListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EcalEventDisplay, EcalEventDisplayWithRawWaveform, EcalFeeMonitor, EcalPedestalViewer

    public interface CrystalListener
extends EventListener
    Interface CrystalListener receives events from a Viewer component regarding crystals. These include whenever a crystal is activated (i.e. it becomes highlighted), deactivated (i.e. it is no longer highlighted), and clicked.
